cause.description:
Our mission is to bring happiness to people through love-filled cupcakes while donating half of our proceeds to Greenpeace, an international organization fighting for peace, environmental justice, and a healthier world.
Contact Co-Owners: Taylor Nowlin: 971-645-8331 Erin Axelrod: 503-442-1831 For your own Peace Cake or catering needs.
1. Protect the environment and advocate peace for the world.
cause.mission: Change the World One Cupcake at a Time.
cause.name: Peace Cakes
